descriptionHtml:
Kept by necromancers at Falkwreath Watchtower, this tome will teach conjouration, if you can retrieve it.

This is my version of the Necronomicon from "Evil Dead".

**DISCLAIMER** Not responsible for...forgetting words or incantations, deadites or other undead/ demons from appearing or infesting in your PC, uncontrolled storms/ thunder /lightning, not getting a good price at S-mart or other stores...



DO NOT upload to other sites or use assets without my permission. Thanks.
author: badgremlin
